title: How to Make 'Sawi' Pickles

steps.headline: Take 5 bunches of 'sawi' and hang it under the sun for about 1 hour.
Wash it thoroughly until it clean.
Roll and tie them to make it round.
Prepare salt water to soak the 'sawi'.
Take the 1st washed water of rice and add 5 spoonful of salt.
Put the round 'sawi' into the salted washed water rice.
Make sure all the 'sawi' are in the salted washed water rice.
After 5 days, take it out and wash it again

text: Dry the 'sawi'.  Take 5 bunches of 'sawi' and hang it under the sun for about 1 hour.  Wash it thoroughly until it clean.  Roll and tie them to make it round.  Prepare salt water to soak the 'sawi'.  Wash 5 cup of rice.  Take the 1st washed water of rice and add 5 spoonful of salt.  Stir it.  Soak the 'sawi'.  Put the round 'sawi' into the salted washed water rice.  Make sure all the 'sawi' are in the salted washed water rice.  Soak it for about 5 days.  After 5 days, take it out and wash it again
